channel.title: Facebook on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.15: Rise and Fall
item.description: 22nd April, 2011 Janani’s log; Solar date: 220411.12 Last week I had crammed too many activities into my schedule; attending multiple classes, working on the programming, in aerobics, music group and a Greenpeace meeting.

item.title: LOG 1.8: Missing English and The Tree of Gondor
item.description: 11th February, 2011 Hello all, I got a mobile and landline connection. From my home number I can call landlines all over europe for free! So if you are in Europe, let me know your number and we can have a little phone chat ðŸ™‚

item.title: LOG 1.5: Snow, it turns to rain
item.description: 15th January, 2011 Hello everyone, It has been a while since I last wrote. I’ve been busy seeing houses, working (:O ! :)), and going out with friends.

item.title: 7 Steps which will make your blog more popular!
item.description: I love writing. Whether it is pen on paper or finger-tips on keys, the feeling I get when I express myself is uniquely gratifying. In some ways, it doesn’t matter whether people are reading my post or not, because the sheer pleasure of writing is really enough of a motivation.
